heroText: Have the pleasure of inviting you to celebrate this special moment of love and union.
infoParagraph1: Ana and Thiago met on an autumn afternoon when fate decided to bring together two hearts destined to walk together.
infoParagraph2: Now, with great emotion, they invite you to witness the next chapter of this beautiful story: their wedding day. A celebration of love, companionship, and joy that will only be complete with your presence.
